data.name: Arcadia Fallen - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Arcadia Fallen Soundtrack is a collection of 24 original tracks from the game, including the full track from the animated intro feat. Emi Evans, with a second verse written by Evans herself.

Everyone who buys the soundtrack also receives a bonus track with the sparrow's song, sung and performed by our own Jesper Green, for a total of 55 minutes of music from Anemone Valley!
